title: Type of Piano Style on the Kindred Login Theme
body: I was wondering what kind of piano style like baroque or jazz (those are examples) would be the Kindred Login Theme. I found the song very interesting and appealing. It also fits Kindred very well. I use it for my studying and I was wondering if there are other songs with similar styles as this one.

replies.body:
Hey SwaggDaddy,

Thanks for your interest in Kindred! 

I would say the closest thing to Kindred's style is Romantic music. Off the top of my head, I can't think of pieces with the same kind of techniques (I am not a pianist myself, so my knowledge of the repertoire isn't concentrated on piano technique), but there is plenty of stuff for you to chew on in the works of Rachmaninoff, early Scriabin, Prokofiev, etc. 

Kindred isn't concert music and caters to the champion's story, and some of the more ambient moments of the piece echo the piano works of Ravel and Satie. 

Of course, I am in no way comparing my work on Kindred to that of the masters I just mentioned. I'm a padawan, they're Master Jedis.

ty so much for ur help. IMO that song compared to what I have composed is on a completely different scale. I really like your song and Master or Padawan, one can continue to grow to become a great composer.
ty so much for ur help
